alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Inland Brunswick (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 2:54PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brunswick and eastern Horry Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 253 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Iredell, or near Little River, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shallotte, Sunset Beach, Holden Beach, Ocean Isle Beach, Little River, Iredell, Carolina Shores, Calabash, Civie Town, Grissettown, Supply, Longwood, Seaside, Russtown and Brunswick Novant Medical Center. This includes US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 1 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
